gcci.text: H100 supply stabilizes as US-East availability improves, keeping the $3.29/hr average price in check and unlocking deferred capex.

gtpi.text: Token costs compress with DeepSeek driving price competition, while the $1.28/1M input benchmark pushes vendors to boost efficiency.

gagl.text: Annual AI data center load near 180 TWh heightens grid strain, prompting nuclear baseload and faster interconnection upgrades.

aipi.text: Macro sentiment remains constructive yet selective, rewarding sustainable growth as unit economics mature and capital shifts toward efficient leaders.
